code:
def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x,y,z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_triangle = is_triangle([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_xyz_small = all([is_small(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y,z]])
        check_z_right = z == get_right([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_z_lightest = z == lightest([x,y,z], ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_triangle
            and check_xyz_small
            and check_z_right
            and check_z_lightest
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)
